extendedIngredients.name: coloured sprinkles
extendedIngredients.originalString: coloured sprinkles aka jimmies or hundreds-and-thousands

extendedIngredients.name: cornflakes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 150 grams cornflakes gently crushed to smaller pieces

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey

recipes.title: Honey Cornflakes Cups (Honey Joys)
recipes.instructions: In a saucepan, melt butter and honey over gentle heat, until the mixture is frothy.Add crushed cornflakes into the honey butter mixture and stir to coat the cornflakes evenly.Spoon cornflakes into individual mini baking cases and top with coloured sprinkles. Bake at preheated oven of 150°C for 10-12 minutes, or until the cornflakes turn a darker shade of golden. Once cooled, store them in an airtight container.

steps.step: In a saucepan, melt butter and honey over gentle heat, until the mixture is frothy.
Add crushed cornflakes into the honey butter mixture and stir to coat the cornflakes evenly.Spoon cornflakes into individual mini baking cases and top with coloured sprinkles.
Bake at preheated oven of 150°C for 10-12 minutes, or until the cornflakes turn a darker shade of golden. Once cooled, store them in an airtight container.
